version_description:
- iPhone 5 support
- Integration of Facebook account on iOS 6

• New films: Indigo, Tuscan
• New Icon
• Fixed bug that location indicator does not disappear after app is closed

• Updated for iOS 7
• NEW: movie editor with 5 themes to create pro-quality vintage movies
• Recorded videos are saved to Camera Roll
• Fixed sound bug for the built-in video player

- Added projector sound; you can also choose mute or microphone only.
- Enabled video geo-tagging when location service is on.
- Fixed audio sync issue.
- Fixed video orientation bug when device orientation is locked.
- Fixed app crashing during phone calls.
- Improved gallery loading speed.

- Added post-processing abilities of previously recorded videos
- New lens: Super 8
- New films: Noir, 60s
- Added setting: projector sound only
- Added setting: auto-save to Camera Roll
- Added option to delete all movies from My Reels
- Enabled AirPlay

• Fixed compatibility issues on iPhone 4S
• Optimized performance on iOS 5
• Now supports 720P HD video recording on iPhone 4S, iPhone 4, and iPod Touch 4 (iOS 5 required)
• Added Facebook upload

• New film: Pela
• New lens: Classic
• New setting: 4:3/16:9 aspect ratio
• New setting: HD on/off (iPhone 4S, iPhone 4, and iPod Touch 4 running iOS 5.0 or above)

• Support for iOS 8
• Optimized for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
• Apply effects to video clips in the Photos app with 8mm extension
• Video clips now can be deleted in 8mm

• Supports HD video up to 4K
• Better support for iOS 9

• New film: Two-Color (2-Strip) inspired by retro Technicolor film
• New icon
• Better support for iOS 10

• Countdown theme now shows counting numbers correctly on iOS 10
• Fixed possible freezing on iPhone 5

• Optimized for iPhone X
• Better support for iOS 11
• New film: A more retro 2-Strip film

• Supports 1080p video on iPhone 5, 5s, SE
• User interface optimized for iPhone X

• 8mm Vintage Camera is now an universal app that supports both iPhone and iPad
• Supports video zoom
• A new 16mm style frame
• A new film: 3-X inspired by retro black and white reversal film

• Fixed crash when loading iCloud videos
• Fixed cropping of some vertical videos to landscape

• Better support for iOS 13
• Support for Dark Mode (requires iOS 13)
• Optimized for iPad Pro's screen size
• Miscellaneous bug fixes

• Supports trimming when editing Reels
• Includes stability and reliability improvements
• Better support for iOS 14
